subject: Shipping of my order #SSN5145
description_text:
I bought a pedal system on dec 22nd, but have not been notified of any
progress on the order. When will it be shipped ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Hugues Verclytte,    Your order has been shipped. We apologize for not updating you in a timely manner.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510401766157/trackdetails
